Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review feedback from @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 on the project overview and FAQs.
Incorporate the final feedback from @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 into the project overview and FAQs. Prepare the final versions for distribution.
Finalize the communication plan, including specific communication channels (e.g., email, intranet, meetings), target audiences, and timelines for disseminating information.
Design email template for disseminating the project overview and FAQs. Ensure professional and visually appealing design.
Test the email template and content with a small group (e.g., @helpdesk-1, @trainer-1) to ensure it renders correctly and is easy to understand. Topic: Email Template Testing.
Distribute the project overview and FAQs via email to all relevant stakeholders. Include a brief introduction explaining the purpose of the project and encouraging feedback.
Post the project overview and FAQs on the hospital intranet for easy access by all employees. Include a link to a feedback form.
Set up a system for tracking communication effectiveness. This may include tracking email open rates, intranet page views, and feedback form submissions.
Monitor initial communication metrics and address any questions or concerns raised by stakeholders.
End of day. Leave the office.
